kv12.9:1.5: Hañci diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike rūpe rajjeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.9:2.7: amanussitthiyā tiracchānagatitthiyā nāgakaññāya methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭiseveyya, ajeḷakaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, kukkuṭasūkaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, hatthigavassavaḷavaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya …
kv12.9:2.10: Hañci diṭṭhisampanno puggalo tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.9:3.1: ☑ Diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
kv12.9:3.3: Arahato pahīnā duggati, arahā āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
kv12.9:3.5: diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike sadde …
kv12.9:3.11: Arahato pahīnā duggati, arahā tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyyāti?
kv12.9:4.1: ☑ Arahato pahīnā duggati, na ca arahā āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
kv12.9:4.3: Diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, na ca diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
kv12.9:4.5: arahato pahīnā duggati, na ca arahā āpāyike sadde …pe…
kv12.9:4.9: amanussitthiyā tiracchānagatitthiyā nāgakaññāya methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭiseveyya, ajeḷakaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, kukkuṭasūkaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyya, hatthigavassavaḷavaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya …pe…
kv12.9:4.12: Diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, na ca diṭṭhisampanno puggalo tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṁ paṭiggaṇheyyāti?
kv12.9:5.8: Tena hi diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggatīti.
